title: 10/27/2020 - HOUR 1 - Jerry Jones, Buccaneers, Bears
itunes:title: 10/27/2020 - HOUR 1 - Jerry Jones, Buccaneers, Bears
description:
Jerry Jones is upset that he might have made a mistake hiring Mike McCarthy

The Buccaneers are the best team in the NFC

The Bears need to focus more on offense


Guest: Doug Gottlieb

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
